Please remember to read my buying guidelines below and on my user info page.
Thanks!!

Lots of assorted goodies,belts,hats,hair dye,sunglasses,books,mags,hair falls,etc! REMEMBER, TO RESERVE YOUR ITEM YOU MUST SEND ME YOUR MAILING ADDRESS THROUGH EMAIL SO I CAN CALCULATE SHIPPING,AND READ MY PROFILE FOR TRANSACTION RULES. SESSIONNINE@CHARTER.NET Phone Brand: Samsung Condition: Used. You can see from the pics that it has some scuffs,but nothing major at all! Phone works perfectly. (You can't see some detail because of the flash but I assure you,all numbers and features are in tact.) Phone Model: A620 Display: Color Service Compatibility: Sprint PCS Features: Camera Built-In and flash, PDA, full color Screen, Email / Web,enhanced image storage,voice activated phone book and dialing,and more! Phone comes complete with box,battery,user manual,charger,and carry strap. 25.00 Touch Screen Data Organizer. Computer style touch screen,32 city world clock,searchable 83 record phone directory and 47 event scheduler,calculator,security code,user selectable 12/24 hour clock with alarm and more! Brand new in box. 12.00 Lot of 3 offensive buttons left from this pic. Don't You Fucking Look At Me,Have A Great Day You Worthless Turd,and It's All About Me Deal With It. 3.00 Lot1-Outburn issues # 28,29,30. Featuring bands such as Lamb of God,Rammstein,Marilyn Manson,Atreyu,Ministry and much more! Metal Hammer-with Atreyu,The Used,Lacuna Coil,Metallica and more! Rolling Stone-with Slipknot,The Strokes,Shirley Manson and more! 14.00 Lot2-Newgrave issues 4,5. Featuring London After Midnight,Lycia,Screams for Tina,Fear Cult,Cinema Strange,Rozz Williams and more! Propaganda magazine issue #27. Exclusive fetish punk gothic outlaw chic magazine! Mojo Limited Electro-Edition featuring Depeche Mode,Gary Numan,New Order and more! 14.00 Lot4-Lenore issues 2,6,9. And Wedgies. 11.00 Lot5-Griffin issue 1. Gloomcookie-A Monster's Christmas. Charm School issues 1,5. I Feel Sick #2,by Jhonen Vasquez. Spiritus Sancti. 9.00 Lot6-Dark Realms Magazine issues 11,13,15,16,17. Featuring articles on Rob Zombie,Collide,dreams,contact with the afterlife,urban legends,Lord of the Rings,Darklore Manor,Van Helsing,zombies,The Rasmus,The Phantom of the Opera,Houdini,haunted Hollywood,The Amityville Horror,Heavy Red fashions and much more! 18.00 Lot8-Courtney Crumrin issues 1,2,3,4. by Ted Naifeh. 9.00 Scar Tissue by Anthony Kiedis,brand new. 11.00 Items I do not have pics for right now(I can take them if you need them),but all in great to new shape: The Sex and the City trivia game. All pieces and pink metal box included! 15.00 The Tale of the Body Thief,by Anne Rice. Hardcover without slipcover. 9.00 Violin,by Anne Rice. Hardcover without slipcover. 9.00 The Vampire Armand,by Anne Rice. Hardcover with slipcover. 10.00 Wicked,The Life and Times of the Wicked Witch of the West,by Gregory Maguire. Softcover. 9.00 Manson,In His Own Words,by Charles Manson and Nuel Emmons. Softcover. 9.00 Break on Through,The Life and Death of Jim Morrison,by James Riordan and Jerry Prochnicky. Softcover. 8.00 Cut,by Patricia McCormick. A book about one girls struggle with cutting and the emotional rollercoaster that goes along with it. Softcover. 8.00 Alternative Press issues 203,208,211,212. Featuring Deftones,Atreyu,My Chemical Romance,Alkaline Trio,NIN,Horrorpops,Vaux and more! 14.00 Hair: 2 black and white silky falls. Ribbon mounted,never worn. Length approx 20in each fall. (The pic dulls the white a bit;these are truly black and white falls.) 15.00

Jewlery: REMEMBER, TO RESERVE YOUR ITEM YOU MUST SEND ME YOUR MAILING ADDRESS THROUGH EMAIL SO I CAN CALCULATE SHIPPING,AND READ MY PROFILE FOR TRANSACTION RULES. SESSIONNINE@CHARTER.NET Cute silver charm bracelet with NYC,shull,cross,flower,and lace/flower charms on it. Approx 8in long. Brand new! 6.00 Used by me,but in good condition(just needs a little leather oil),o-ring bondage bracelet. Approx 8 1/2 inches long. Band is approx 1in wide. Heavy leather and o-rings,not the cheap shit you see now at Hot Topic,lol. 10.00 Adorable stretchy red dice bracelet! Brand new and one size will fit all,even plus size. 4.00 Used but in almost perfect condition plastic and metal spike bracelet. Very cool! Approx 8in long and band is approx 1in wide. 6.00 Brand new chain link bracelet. Awesome piece! Heavy,not plastic crap,lol. Approx 8 1/2 inches long. 8.00

Shirts here: ALL PRICES INCLUDE SHIPPING!!!!!! Lip Service O ring corset style vinyl top. Zipper front closure. I only wore this top 2 times,so it is in perfect condition!!! This is the ULTIMATE club/cyber/industrial/goth top!!!! Size 2X. Measurements taken flat: Bust approx 20inches,waist approx 19in,length approx 21 inches from top of shoulder. Slight stretch because it is vinyl,but not too much. Please check measurements. Don't miss out!! Plus Size Lip Service items hard to come by!!! **Picture faults are from lighting and camera,this item is exactly as it should be. 18.00

Welcome to EvilSales!!!
REMEMBER TO READ ALL PAYMENT INFO IN MY USER PAGE!!!!

This is a simple page with simple sales.
Scroll to the appropriate entry for the right items.
Please leave feedback to this post with the item you purchased and you satisfaction with it. Thank you!

RULES:
DO NOT harrass me about prices. They are what they are. All items are in near perfect to perfect condition so you are not getting crap from somebodies garage.
NO TRADES.
***YOU MUST READ THE PAYMENT INFO IN MY USERNAME INFO.*** 
This contains paying,shipping,my feedback from ebay and gothauctions, and all other pertinent info.
I have 100% positive feedback on both websites,so I am a trusted seller.
Have any other questions ask me.
Cheers and thanks my little evil ones!
Stephanie
